function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of virus particles in the built environment","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases through contaminated air, leading to increased transmission rates","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, implementing air purifiers, and using masks to reduce inhalation of virus particles","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, air quality sensors, and filtration technology","People":"Occupants, building staff, and visitors","Owner":"Building managers, facility maintenance teams, and public health authorities"}]}
